channel.title: Comments on: Linda writes, “Help! My computer says someone is using my IP address!”
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Marian Hone
item.dc:creator: Marian Hone
item.description: I get that sometimes. Do you have other people in the house using their devices? I think I get that message because my daughter or her boyfriend is logging onto the network elsewhere in the house. I can't remember how I worked that out now but I've just ignored those messages since and never had a problem.
item.content:encoded: I get that sometimes. Do you have other people in the house using their devices? I think I get that message because my daughter or her boyfriend is logging onto the network elsewhere in the house. I can’t remember how I worked that out now but I’ve just ignored those messages since and never had a problem.
